name: Ricochet (itch) (bigGeefa)
description:
This game was made for the GDevelop Game Jam #1 (2022). We had fun making it and we hope you have fun playing it. 

Instructions:

Princess Doloris is being attacked by fireballs raining from above. Fortunately, she has special powers to build and rebuild blocks to divert harm away 

She can build a maximum of five blocks at a time.

Use arrow keys to move the blocks and space bar to build them. HOLD the space bar AND use arrow keys to rebuild the new batch of blocks.

As your score gets higher, the difficulty gets harder.... Good luck!
